about_the_game:
The Abyss Break is a hardcore first-person co-op horror extraction game, where you and your team venture into dangerous parallel worlds born from the Abyss.

Cut off from outside support, you must rely on an underground residential complex and its inhabitants — scavenging and trading valuable resources, taking on contracts, and fighting for survival.

Each parallel world is bound by a shared catastrophe. The locals failed to stop the threat of the Great Expansion, but you have a chance to change the fate of your own reality. You know how to enter foreign worlds — and return.

Key Features

  • Survival Favors the Prepared

    You have full control over how you arrange your pouches, armor plates, and support gear. Customize your weapons with attachments like suppressors, magazines, sights, and more to suit your playstyle.

  • Time Is Against You

    The Abyss is unstable — an alien reality is about to tear you apart. Escape before it's too late. But remember, rushing blindly might attract too much attention.

  • Stronger Together

    Form a team of up to three players, combining stealth, combat, and resource gathering to withstand relentless threats.

  • Total Immersion

    The world reacts to your actions — footsteps, open doors, and missing resources won’t go unnoticed. With dynamic weather, a day–night cycle, and detailed environments, every mission feels unpredictable and immersive.

This is just the beginning! We’ll be revealing more details and gameplay mechanics over time. Add it to your Wishlist so you don’t miss out!

name: The Abyss Break

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: 4 core CPU (AMD or Intel). 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics Preset: Medium.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: 8 core CPU (AMD or Intel). 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080 or AMD compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics Preset: High.

short_description: Hardcore first-person co-op horror extraction game. Explore the parallel worlds of the Abyss alone or with a team, gather resources, and make life-or-death decisions that will determine your survival.
